title: Uttarpradesh govt revokes ban on evening coaching for girls
comments: Huge win for the activists who called out this law and got it revoked.
Who put the ban in the first place? Taliban?
By confining girls to their homes, Uttar Pradesh cannot ensure their safety. Such a ban was unnecessary and unjustified.
They going to take credit for this by saying that Fantaji made UP safe again so lifted the ban.

Fantaji!!!
I cannot unsee this. This is gold!
